meaningMnemonic: <radical>Fire</radical> you use to light up the <radical>street</radical> needs to go in a <kanji>lamp</kanji>. Campfires, matches? No, none of those work. You need bright, safe lamps to keep the street nice at night.
readingMnemonic: These street <kanji>lamp</kanji>s were first used in <reading>とう</reading>きょう. It was the most advanced city after all. And more people were out at night in とうきょう than anywhere else in Japan. So they needed lamps to light things up!
